name: Timeácait
description:
This project is currently on hold. I lost a bunch progress after switching computers so I'm devoting my time to my Markiplier fangame. I will return to this game later.

Explore a city of elves as the main character who is about go on a journey. Why aren't their ears pointy you ask? Well can you give me one reason unrelated to magic that the ears should be pointy. This RPG game will take you through the story of an elf fighting some demons for a reason I won't reveal until the end. I bet you can't wait to find out what twist I will through into the middle that change your whole idea on what's going on. Feel free to download this demo and tell about how many spelling errrorrs I made. Thanks a tonn.
